translation:
Mr. Anacleto José de Matos, army paymaster, from the cash on hand, will deliver to citizen José de Sousa Neto or to his order Rs. 3:986$120, three million nine hundred eighty-six thousand one hundred and twenty, the amount of three hundred and seventy horses which by order of His Excellency

Field to the left of Jaguarão, January 13, 1837. Antônio de Sousa Neto Interim Commander of the Army Domingos José de Almeida. Colonel Quartermaster General.
